title: 2 Bedroom Balcony Apt for October
posting_body: ['1332 Mississippi Street N, Saint Paul, MN 55130', '$1082 / Month', 'Apply Here: <URL> and click', 'Applicants', 'Rolling Hills Apartments are located in a wonderful community with easy access to dining, shopping and transportation.', 'Live only minutes from downtown St. Paul and steps from public transportation.', 'We are smoke-free and pet friendly!', 'All information deemed accurate but not guaranteed.', 'Details:', 'Bedrooms: 2', 'Pets: 2 pet limit with additional pet deposit and pet rent', 'Total Area: 728 sq ft', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Smoking:', 'No', 'Terms:', 'Deposit:', "Same as one month's rent", 'Minimum Lease: 6 months, additional Short Lease Fee with 6 month lease.', 'No fee with 12 month lease.', 'Available: 10/08/2022', 'Other Charges: Tenant pays electric.', 'Amenities:', 'Our renovated, spacious apartment homes include large closets, air conditioning, hard wood floors, carpeting and more!', 'Enjoy our recreation room, on-site laundry facilities, media room, playground, summer garden plots and more!', 'Section 42 Affordable Tax Credit Housing', 'Upon management approval of the rental application, all prospective residents must complete a Household Questionnaire packet, with applicable verification forms, to determine eligibility for the Section 42 Housing Tax Credit program.', 'All prospective residents must meet the Section 42 Housing Tax Credit income guidelines', '(as listed below)', 'and Section 42 Housing Tax Credit Annual Student Certification criteria', '(as listed below)', 'prior to final management approval for move-in.', 'Income Requirements', 'The Low Income Housing Tax Credit Program requires that we use', '60%', 'income limits.', "To be eligible, all applicants' income and assets must be verified, and the household's income cannot exceed the required limits for the unit available and number of people in the household.", 'Move-In is not permitted until the Section 42 Tax Credit paperwork is completed and final approval is received.', 'Occupant Income ranges from $25,968 - $49.320', 'Occupant Income ranges from\xa0$25,968 - $56.340', 'Occupant Income ranges from\xa0$25,968 - $63.360', 'Occupant Income ranges from\xa0$25,968 - $70.380', 'Student Requirements', 'Households that consist entirely of full-time students are considered ineligible unless they meet one of the following criteria:', 'Students who are married and entitled to a joint tax return.', 'Single parent with child(ren) and the parent is not a dependent of someone else, and the child(ren) is/are not dependent(s) of someone other than a parent', 'At least one member of the household received assistance under Title IV of the Social Security Act (Minnesota Family Investment Program)', 'At least one member of the household participates in a program receiving assistance under the Job Training Partnership Act or Workforce Investment Act or similar federal, state, or local laws.', 'A household member was in foster care within the last 5 years', 'Fair Housing', 'This property does not discriminate against applicants or residents on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, marital status, familial status, handicap, disability, or socioeconomic class.', 'Our policies are designed to comply with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Fair Housing Act Amendments of 1988, and Title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.']
